en-US.summary: Provides information regarding of the humidity, temperature and employee attendance at Cosmetic Plant
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask my magic mirror about the realtime temperature
Alexa, ask how many employees are working today from Cask my magic mirror
Alexa, ask ask my magic mirror what are the averages temperatures for the last week
en-US.name: api-temperature
en-US.description: Check who is at work today at Cosmetic Plant! Just say: Alexa, ask my magic mirror who is working
